name: COFFEE? BREAK!
description:
When the shift becomes so boring that you are falling asleep, the best thing to do is to drink  a cup of hot coffee, but what if coffee machines are not working?

Game was created for Mini Jam 2021 with theme 'Break'

I messed up with the final version, so  to turn music on during the game you need to press ESC, and then choose 'Resume' button
